TopicTitle: How Much Time Have You Spent Playing KSP?

Articles.Content:
I have had the game running for 1443 hours so far, according to Steam. And I have been to just about everywhere in the stock system, but mostly not *recently* and not all with spacecraft that look *nice*, which is something I hope to change.

**Edited <time datetime="2019-01-23T13:45:35Z" title="01/23/2019 01:45  PM" data-short="5 yr">January 23, 2019</time> by septemberWaves**

As of January 18th, I've played 8,142 hours of Kerbal Space Program. As far as I know I have the most hours.![EOkwEAnUwAAdBxT?format=jpg&name=small](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/EOkwEAnUwAAdBxT?format=jpg&name=small)
According to Steam, I have exactly 500 hours played.
